item.title: Praise command!
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“dark-under-world, post:2, topic:274855”]Hold on i’ll tell you in a second.

EDIT:

if(command.equals(“command you want”) && playerRights >= rights you want) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if(p != null) {
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client

     {
     PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Bow to me!";
          string4UpdateRequired = true;
     {
     castOn.setAnimation(858);
     castOn.txt4="TXT you want them to say!";
     castOn.string4UpdateRequired = true; }

}

  }

}
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2009, 08:48:30 pm[/size][hr]This might work i just stole out of figment source.[/quote]Rofl? Leeched from my server? I gave that command out to someone like 1 year ago and then they released with there server. Alot of servers have like “O dis serva ownz iz da shitz!” and have them bowing or even having the gs emote and everybody dieing.

Read full topic

item.title: Praise command!
item.dc:creator: @dark-under-world dark-under-world
item.description:
@dark-under-world wrote:

Hold on i’ll tell you in a second.

EDIT:

if(command.equals(“command you want”) && playerRights >= rights you want) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if(p != null) {
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client

     {
     PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Bow to me!";
          string4UpdateRequired = true;
     {
     castOn.setAnimation(858);
     castOn.txt4="TXT you want them to say!";
     castOn.string4UpdateRequired = true; }

}

  }

}
